last_episode_to_air.name: Youth And Its Last Night
last_episode_to_air.overview: Everyone is busy taking orders, cooking, and serving. As most of them are new to running a food truck, they start making mistakes here and there. But once they get the hang of it, they start checking if the customers are enjoying their food and time, and some even take photos with them. Meanwhile, some familiar faces visit the Young Actors’ Bar. As the night deepens, the young actors feel tired and proud at the same time.

name: Young Actors' Retreat
overview: Members of each drama team mix together, play various MT games, and travel together, building new friendships and creating pleasant memories.

episodes.name: Where Are Your Team Members?
episodes.overview: In this episode, the casts of Love in the Moonlight, Itaewon Class, and The Sound of Magic are going on a trip together as a group. However, the actors are hiding in different places where they've shot the drama, and Captain You Jung, Captain Seo Jun, and Captain Chang Wook have to find their co-stars so they can travel to the base camp at Buyeo together. Where would they be hiding? Stay tuned to find out!

episodes.name: Young Actors' Retreat Base Camp
episodes.overview: In this episode, all three teams arrive at the base camp in Boryeong! However, even though they are successful and popular actors and actresses who starred in famous Korean dramas, they are introverts and get extremely shy as they meet other team members. Will they be able to get along with each other? Stay tuned to find out!

episodes.name: The Abandoned School
episodes.overview: The members were shy when they first met but have become close through games and dinner. Meanwhile, as the first night of the retreat deepens, mysterious friends are waiting for the members at an abandoned school. Each team needs to complete its given mission to avoid the terrifying penalty. Will they be able to escape from school safely?

episodes.name: Team Activity And Team Hanok
episodes.overview: In this week's episode, the horror training continues with the rest of the members. This time, they go into the bathhouse to finish their mission. Which team will come back last for a penalty? After giving them a wild night, the staff prepares delightful tour programs for the members. They get to choose between exciting activities and a Hanok tour, and a new member joins them.

episodes.name: Hold Your Breath And Dive Into Youth
episodes.overview: It's the second day of the retreat. Team Activity enjoys ziplining right on the beach and feasts on the local delicacies. Back at base camp, Team Hanok challenges each other at board games. The losers must cook ramyeon as a penalty. Later, Flying Chairs takes place, where keywords and gestures determine the outcome.

episodes.name: The Last Journey Of Young Actors' Retreat
episodes.overview: The Young Actors' Dive continues to decide the winner, and the loser will get the penalty. Who will be the honourable team to prepare breakfast on the last day? Meanwhile, the actors decide to do something meaningful for the last day, and they prepare a surprise for the fans of these three dramas. Stay tuned to find out more!

episodes.name: Young Actors’ Bars Start Running
episodes.overview: The teams decide on their tent bar names and menu. Team Itaewon decides to serve gambas al ajillo with top-blade steak, Team Magic chooses fried chicken and stir-fried sundae and entrails, and Team Moonlight chooses shredded potato jeon and bibim guksu. Team Moonlight’s master chef You Jung leads her team while Team Itaewon and Team Magic seek external advisors. Just when everyone thought they were ready to open for business, things start to go wrong here and there.

episodes.name: Youth And Its Last Night
episodes.overview: Everyone is busy taking orders, cooking, and serving. As most of them are new to running a food truck, they start making mistakes here and there. But once they get the hang of it, they start checking if the customers are enjoying their food and time, and some even take photos with them. Meanwhile, some familiar faces visit the Young Actors’ Bar. As the night deepens, the young actors feel tired and proud at the same time.
